sourcesContent: import*as e from"react";import{Hub as r}from"aws-amplify";import{UI_CHANNEL as a,ACTION_NAVIGATE_STARTED as o,EVENT_ACTION_CORE_NAVIGATE as t,ACTION_NAVIGATE_FINISHED as n}from"./constants.mjs";import{AMPLIFY_SYMBOL as s}from"../../helpers/constants.mjs";const l="noopener noreferrer",c="_self",i=i=>{const{type:p,url:d,anchor:m,target:u}=i,h=e.useMemo((()=>{switch(p){case"url":return()=>{window.open(d,u||c,l)};case"anchor":return()=>{window.location.hash=null!=m?m:""};case"reload":return()=>{window.location.reload()};default:return()=>{console.warn('Please provide a valid navigate type. Available types are "url", "anchor" and "reload".')}}}),[m,u,p,d]);return()=>{r.dispatch(a,{event:o,data:i},t,s),h(),r.dispatch(a,{event:n,data:i},t,s)}};export{c as defaultTarget,i as useNavigateAction,l as windowFeatures};
